section.p: You have come to the long hall, painted with murals of the life of Xinoc the Priest-King. At the far end, the archway is completely sealed with a solid block of stone. Beyond it is the chamber in which you had to leave your equipment when you were magically shrunken. From this side, you notice a small triangular hole in the block.

If you have a pyramid key, .
If not, you leave. .
